plot: In this road movie through Southeast Asia a newly discharged Army soldier in search of his MIA father links up with two fellow lost souls for a journey into deepest Cambodia that is, by turns, both touching and hilarious.
title: Bangkok
plot_es: In this road movie through Southeast Asia a newly discharged Army soldier in search of his MIA father links up with two fellow lost souls for a journey into deepest Cambodia that is, by turns, both touching and hilarious.
